title: Wow, we've come full circle to three item Twitch 100 to 0'ing mages in ~1 second

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Moody P,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iwdAkG3R,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-02-07T02:25:38.485+0000)
>
> hasn't twitch always done that

Yes, Playing against a fed twitch is like a horror movie. He comes out of nowhere and you are dead before you can even react, and if you can react, you can't attack him back because he is 850 units away.
